appointment.heading: Make an appointment with a specialist doctor
appointment.step1heading: 1. Choose the doctor's field of expertise
appointment.list1: In every field we have chosen the best doctors for you!
appointment.list2: Choose the doctor's field of expertise and whether the consultation is for an adult or a child.
appointment.list3: Specify the reason for the referral so that our smart engine matches the most suitable doctor for you.
appointment.step2heading: 2. Mark possible dates for coordinating a consultation with a doctor
appointment.list4: Choose from the weekly schedule the options that are convenient for you for the consultation meeting.
appointment.list5: Our smart engine will locate an available specialist doctor, who will get back to you with two appointments.
appointment.list6: Choose the most convenient time, confirm and you will be transferred to the payment.
appointment.list7: Later on the appointment page you can fill out a medical questionnaire and upload documents that will be available to the doctor for the call.
appointment.list8: After successfully receiving the payment details, the appointment is scheduled for the selected date and will appear on your "My Appointments" page.
appointment.list9: The meeting itself takes place through a Zoom call.

ourExpert.heading: The leading expert doctors in every field
ourExpert.para1: A network of carefully selected specialist doctors are available for a call at the click of a button.
ourExpert.para2: The experts who work with hidoc are doctors licensed to practice medicine in their fields of expertise in Israel.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.paragraph2: Feel free to leave a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible :-)

footer.note: The site is not intended for an emergency situation - do not use this site in a life-threatening situation.
